svcproc.title: IAH Relay (Intake Air Heater)
svcproc.para: It is mounted on the large support bracket behind the cab. The dust cover must be removed for access to the relay. The ECM controls the intake air heater relay 1 that controls the intake air heater to warm the incoming air to aid cold engine starting and reduce exhaust emissions during warm-up. The intake air heater relay is the taller of the two relays.
